xml.log: If there is an update when the file file is missing, go to Steam Client - Library List - mydockfinder - right-click menu - Properties - Local File - Verify software file integrity If the desktop icon is not displayed after enabling pre-stage scheduling, you can right-click on the desktop-view-display desktop icon to enable display desktop icon If using MSI Airplane will cause irregular freezing or crashing issues, you can set it in MSI Airplane, add dock_64.exe, then select dock_64.exe, and finally select "None" on the right side. Changelog 1.Fixed the issue that Steam would open the explorer when using offline startup in some systems 2.Fixed the crash issue caused by the animation of some system windows 3.Fixed the issue that the Dock was stuck after turning off Minimized Dock in the previous version preferences 4.Fixed rendering errors in previous versions 5.Fixed the issue that some new Intel CPUs did not display temperature 6.Fixed the issue that myfinder was displayed on the same screen when starting up with multi-screen boot in all previous versions (to be experimented) 7.Fixed the issue that the lyrics were rendered incorrectly after the lyrics of the player were hidden in all previous versions 8.Fix other issues 9.Added Slovak translation, thanks to netizen @grimind-tech 10.Myfinder lyrics added the function of adjusting the lyrics cropping, click the myfinder lyrics secondary menu 11.Added the function of adjusting the height of myfinder, which can be adjusted in myfinder general 12.Added the function of adjusting the longitudinal offset and button spacing of the buttons in myfinder, which can be adjusted in myfinder generally 13.Added Delay Hidden MyFinder function, which can be adjusted in MyFinder General 14.Dock icon adds high-quality rendering, which can be enabled in Preferences - Advanced 15.The Dock weather forecast icon adds a weather interface, and you can directly click on the weather icon in the Dock to add the weather of up to 5 cities
